The definition of T staging in non-small cell lung cancer is shown in @tbl-stages.

<div>

| **T** | **Primary Tumor** |
|:-------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------|
| **Tx** | Primary tumor cannot be assessed, or tumor proven by the presence of malignant cells in sputum or bronchial washings but not visualized by imaging or bronchoscopy |
| **T0** | No evidence of primary tumor |
| **Tis** | Carcinoma in situ <br> Squamous cell carcinoma in situ (SCIS) <br> Adenocarcinoma in situ (AIS): adenocarcinoma with pure lepidic pattern, â‰¤3 cm in greatest dimension |
